text:
@NBCNews @rleas @realDonaldTrump knows that #COVID19 isn’t going to end, but he can’t admit his #FailedLeadership -A true leader listens to others & learns from others. #Trump will continue deflecting to the end, NEVER being honest enough to tell the #truth 

#AmericaStrongWithBiden
